answers.answer: these are things that a doctor would know

question: Hi,I am 30 years old, married 4yrs back. I have PCOs. I concieved twice but had miscarriages. Last month 13th I had a miscarriage and from then I have started taking Metformin Hydrochloride 500 mg twice daily. Will it help me to become pregnant again, soon? I have hairfall problem too. Will it stop my hairfall and grow new hair? Will this PCO with Blood sugar fasting 106mgl and PP 146 be deemed as impaired diabetes and will I get diabetes soon? How to avoid diabetes?
title: chances of pregnancy after miscarriage
